content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────────────
### Central Production Hub at position(0.5, 0.5)
Consists of:
- Wooden chest at position(0.5, 0.5) serving as the central resource storage.
- Stone furnace at position(1.0, -1.0) used for smelting iron ore into iron-plate.
- Stone furnace at position(3.0, 1.0) used for smelting copper ore into copper-plate.

### Research Lab at position(6.5, 6.5)
Consists of:
- Lab at position(6.5, 6.5) with lab input {'automation-science-pack': 10}, status NO_POWER, researching automation, electrical_id 30228.
- ElectricityGroup (id 30228) connecting small electric poles at positions (10.5, 7.5), (8.5, 6.5), (9.5, 6.5).

### Steam-Powered Electricity Generator at position(-10.5, 18.5)
Consists of:
- Generator (steam engine) at position(-10.5, 18.5) for electricity production; warnings: "not connected to power network", "no input liquid", "no fluid present in connections".
- Boiler at position(-6.0, 24.5) used for heating water; warnings: "out of fuel"; contains water (≈190.14 at temperature 15) with connection points at (-5.5, 22.5) and (-5.5, 26.5) and steam output at (-7.5, 24.5); linked to fluid_system 163555.
- Offshore Pump at position(-9.5, 24.5) for water intake, status WORKING; linked to fluid_system 163555.
- Wooden chest at position(-4.5, 25.5) for manual fuel feeding.
- Pipeline Network consisting of the following PipeGroups:
   • PipeGroup at position(-5.5, 19.5) with fluid_system 163555; status WORKING.
   • PipeGroup at position(-2.5, 19.5) with fluid_system 163554; status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(5.5, 21.5) with fluid_system 163567; status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(1.5, 23.5) with fluid_system 163566; status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(-7.5, 25.5) with fluid_system 163562; status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(0.5, 24.5) with fluid_system 163571; status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(1.5, 25.5) with fluid_system 163570; status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(1.5, 27.5) with fluid_system 163573; status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(4.5, 27.5) with fluid_system 163574; status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(-0.5, 28.5) with fluid_system 163575; status EMPTY.

ERROR TIPS
────────────────────────────
• Incorrect Fluid_System Identifier Usage:
   - Multiple connection attempts using candidate pipe groups with fluid_system identifiers [162891, 162975, 163057, 163141, 163223, 163307, 163389, 163473] failed due to no candidate pipe group being found. Tip: Ensure the active fluid_system identifier (now 163555 as seen in the updated pipeline network) is used when issuing connection commands.

• Misaligned Search Parameters:
   - Repeated failure to locate appropriate pipe groups indicates that search parameters (such as the radius and fluid_system values) do not match the current pipeline network configuration. Tip: Adjust search inputs to reflect the updated positions and fluid_system identifiers of available pipe groups.
